creator: HomeOne Technologies LLP
descriptionHtml:
HomeOne Technologies is a company with the ambitious vision of bringing super simple user centric products which solve meaningful consumer problems.

DEFT is a one of its kind Home Automation System that is present and available in the industry today. DEFT provides the BEST solution to HOME complications and problems with cutting edge technology that is not only available but also durable and affordable. Without a doubt, it can be within everybody's reach!

Advanced Security, Artificial Intelligence, sensor control and Energy saving are some of our very unique features that no other company is offering even near to the extent of our perfection.

We are also offering lifetime free upgrades for all our software upgrades. And there are no annual or monthly maintenance charges for anything. We are available 24x7 in case you have any issue just call our customer care and you will be served within next 2 working hours.

-- Advanced Security and Surveillance : Now secure your HOME with the DEFT’s IP Camera and get alarmed on suspicious movements outside your place. When somebody will ring a bell you will get a call on your mobile phone, not only will you be able to see who is outside your home, but also communicate with them through the mike installed on the IP Camera. Accordingly you can open or lock the doors with a simple click on your phone from anywhere around the world.

-- Artificial Intelligence : Lastly, DEFT has a brain of its own. It will be gathering information from the internet to update you about the latest news, about the weather and even might suggest you a game to watch. Moreover it is going to keep a strict vigilance on the Energy and Security of your Home. So don’t worry if you leave one or two of your appliance ON for no reason, DEFT will remind you and take care of them as well!!!

--Sensor Control : DEFT is laden with Light, Motion and Temperature sensors which makes your HOME incredibly intelligent. It will take care of your needs, save energy at same time, and also gives you an extra security as if there is some motion detected at your home when you are absent you will receive a push notification immediately at your phone.

--Energy Monitor : DEFT will monitor energy consumption of each and every individual appliance and present the data to you in a very easy to understand graphical format. DEFT is constantly processing this data and will notify you if a certain appliance is consuming too much energy or if any appliance is about to malfunction and it will assist you in every step to reduce the energy footprint of your Home.

--Mood Settings: DEFT offers you limitless number of moods for every occasion and every mood. Now you can schedule/set moods according to your needs. Create different combinations of lights for your marriage anniversary, for Your family birthdays and many more. You can even add music systems and TV's.

--Process Of Installation: Our Technician will check your home for your requirements and Feasibility. It's completely free. Then we will consider your requirements and our technicians reviews to form a final quotation. After your acceptance we will proceed with the Installation.

DEFT can do more than just help you control your Home. The AI assistant "CORE" is incredibly smart. She learns from you and an entire community of users and uses sensors and online data to optimize your Home. From simple things like turning off unnecessary devices when you're not at home to complex routine, from HOME SECURITY, ENERGY CONSUMPTION and COMFORT. All you have to say is "YES".
descriptionShort: WiFinity - Smart, Flexible, AI and Community Powered Smart Home.

When somebody will ring a bell you will get a call on your mobile phone, not only will you be able to see who is outside your home, but also communicate with them through the mike installed on the IP Camera. Accordingly you can open or lock the doors with a simple click on your phone from anywhere around the world.

-- Artificial Intelligence : Lastly, WiFinity has a brain of its own. It will be gathering information from the internet to update you about the latest news, about the weather and even might suggest you a game to watch. Moreover it is going to keep a strict vigilance on the Energy and Security of your Home. So don’t worry if you leave one or two of your appliance ON for no reason, DEFT will remind you and take care of them as well!!!

--Sensor Control : WiFinity is laden with Light, Motion and Temperature sensors which makes your HOME incredibly intelligent. It will take care of your needs, save energy at same time, and also gives you an extra security as if there is some motion detected at your home when you are absent you will receive a push notification immediately at your phone.

--Energy Monitor : WiFinity will monitor energy consumption of each and every individual appliance and present the data to you in a very easy to understand graphical format. DEFT is constantly processing this data and will notify you if a certain appliance is consuming too much energy or if any appliance is about to malfunction and it will assist you in every step to reduce the energy footprint of your Home.

--Mood Settings: WiFinity offers you limitless number of moods for every occasion and every mood. Now you can schedule/set moods according to your needs. Create different combinations of lights for your marriage anniversary, for Your family birthdays and many more. You can even add music systems and TV's.

--Process Of Installation: Our Technician will check your home for your requirements and Feasibility. It's completely free. Then we will consider your requirements and our technicians reviews to form a final quotation. After your acceptance we will proceed with the Installation.

WiFinity can do more than just help you control your Home. The AI assistant "CORE" is incredibly smart. She learns from you and an entire community of users and uses sensors and online data to optimize your Home. From simple things like turning off unnecessary devices when you're not at home to complex routine, from HOME SECURITY, ENERGY CONSUMPTION and COMFORT. All you have to say is "YES".
descriptionShort: WiFinity - Smart, Flexible, AI and Community Powered WiFi based Smart Home.
